text: Straight Time is a 1978 American crime drama movie. It was directed by Ulu Grosbard. The movie is based on the book No Beast So Fierce by Edward Bunker (who also stars). Other actors include Dustin Hoffman, Theresa Russell, Harry Dean Stanton, M. Emmet Walsh, Kathy Bates, and Gary Busey.
